resources.string: Enjoy every meme and share the happiness among your friends and the near ones. Get updated with trends.

string.name: second_slide_desc
string.br: Get the answer of your desired question by just tapping on any button on questionnare while thinking about your question.\n
1.Through this Questionnare, whenever you wants to get the answer of your desired question, then first of all you should meditate by remembering god.\n
2.After that,with faith, contemplating the desired question from the mind, the finger should be placed in the desired parenthesis of the questionnare and the answer will be in front of you.

resources.string: Music is the only way to forget all your problems away.Listen and Feel the vibes. Music has the power to lift you up from any problem and diverting your mind towards positivity.
All your problems will be vanished if you work upon it. NO MATTER WHAT OUR PROBLEM, GOD IS THE ONLY SOLUTION.
